hackathon-description-text: Hackpoly is a 24-hour annual hackathon event at Cal Poly Pomona. Participants trade their sleep for a weekend and join a team to create a project - typically software or hardware - in an environment optimized for creativity. At the end of the event, the participants demonstrate their projects to fellow hackers, visitors, and a panel of judges. The event is hosted by
hackathon-rules:
HackPoly follows the MLH Code of Conduct, to be found 
.

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Amazon Web Services - Best Use of AWS

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Is your hack creative, or a brand new idea?
Is the hack polished and completed?
